text: @realDonaldTrump Don’t distract from the number of #COVID19 deaths due to your Gross inefficiency. @realDonaldTrump did it again, will bankrupt America, just like all his business. This is what he does best! #COVIDIOTS #coronavirus #TrumpVirus #TrumpVirusCoverup #TrumpPressConf
